metalign.beat.hmm

Class HmmBeatTrackingModelTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.beat.hmm.HmmBeatTrackingModelTrainer

  • public class HmmBeatTrackingModelTrainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The HmmBeatTrackingModelTrainer class is used to train the parameters for HmmBeatTrackingModelParameters. It just reads in notes and beat/subBeat locations, and then measures the different parameters.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 28 July, 2017

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method for running training the beat-tracker parameters.

        Usage: java -cp bin metalign.beat.hmm.HmmBeatTrackingModelTrainer [ARGS] input1 [input2...]

        Where each input is either a file or a directory. Each file listed as input, and each file beneath every directory listed as input (recursively) is read as input.

        ARGS:
        • -T = Use tracks as correct voice (instead of channels) *Only used for MIDI files.
        • -s INT = Use INT as the sub beat length.
        • -X = Input files are xml directories from CrestMusePEDB.
        • -a FILE = Search recursively under the given FILE for anacrusis files.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments described above.

      • parseFiles

        private static void parseFiles(java.util.List<java.io.File> files,

      • argumentError

        public static void argumentError(java.lang.String message)
        An argument error occurred. Print the usage help info to standard error, and then exit.

        NOTE: This method calls System.exit(1) and WILL NOT return.

        Parameters:
        message - The error message to print at the beginning of the exception.
